data.name: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution - DLC7 Variety Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
The following characters' costumes will be available in Free Battle and Online Battle of NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution:
The Third Hokage (Hokage Costume)
Itachi (w/o Cloak)
Kakashi (Kakuzu Battle Costume)
The First Hokage (Hokage Costume)
Zabuza (Hidden Mist Costume)
data.about_the_game:
The following characters' costumes will be available in Free Battle and Online Battle of NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution:
The Third Hokage (Hokage Costume)
Itachi (w/o Cloak)
Kakashi (Kakuzu Battle Costume)
The First Hokage (Hokage Costume)
Zabuza (Hidden Mist Costume)
data.short_description: This pack contains additional costumes for the Third Hokage, Itachi, Kakashi, the First Hokage, and Zabuza.

fullgame.name: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Мінімальні:
  • ОС: Windows XP or higher with latest Service Pack
  • Процесор: 2.3 GHz Dual Core or AMD
  • Оперативна пам’ять: 1 MB ОП
  • Відеокарта: 512 MB video cards Pixel Shader 4.0 (Geforce 8xxx-ATI HD2xxx)
  • DirectX: версії 9.0c
  • Місце на диску: 8 GB доступного місця
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендовані:
  • ОС: Windows 7 or higher with latest Service Pack
  • Процесор: Intel i3-530, 2.93Ghz / AMD Phenom II X4 940, 3.0GHz
  • Оперативна пам’ять: 4 MB ОП
  • Відеокарта: 1024 MB video card, Pixel Shader 4.0, DirectX10 GPU
  • DirectX: версії 9.0c
  • Місце на диску: 8 GB доступного місця
